name: Cinnamon
properties: Part of Ras el Hanout spice blend
benefits: Cinnamon is a powerful metabolic booster that helps regulate blood sugar levels and improve insulin sensitivity. It's one of the most antioxidant-rich spices available and has significant anti-inflammatory properties. Featured in the Ras el Hanout Moroccan spice blend, it adds warmth and depth to both sweet and savory dishes.
amount: 1/4 to 1 teaspoon per recipe, as part of daily herb and spice servings

quotes: 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon - Ras el Hanout Moroccan spice blend (page 100): 'Meaning head of the shop, this Moroccan spice blend is available in spice shops and online, or you can make your own.'
